Reviews.Title: Smart "dumb" phone!
Reviews.Author: Janice Chiaretto
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! My husband and I keep these as back-ups when we get sick of phones that are too complicated, have bad signal, break easily, can't hold a charge: sound familiar?  Get a nice simple cheap phone like this one and your phone frustrations will be gone! Phone came in short order, excellent like-new condition, unblocked, good battery and a charger to boot. A great deal!!

Reviews.Title: Why we are very satisfied with the phone.
Reviews.Author: Dan J. Bullington
Reviews.Content: Primarily meets our needs as we are an elderly couple in our 80's.  It is the same type we had before...the one that we lost.  Very satisified with the lost replacement.  Wished we could have had a booklet to refresh our memories as to utilizing some of the special things it can do.  i.e. pressing one number for quick dialing.

Reviews.Title: ITS A SHAME.
Reviews.Author: BIG JIM KRAJCECK
Reviews.Content: The phone was a replacement for the same phone I had that went bad. It was a good price the customer service was great but It was a locked unit that did not work with my T-Mobile contract. I had to return it and they handled the return without any problem at all.
